text:
Horus Technology | Milan, Italy or McLean, VA or San Francisco, CA | full-time and internships

We are a startup developing a wearable device for blind and visually impaired people that thanks to deep learning and a bunch of computer vision and machine learning algorithms can describe the world to the visually impaired. Check out more at http://horus.tech/

We are looking for:

- Marketing Strategist

- Communication and PR specialits

- Business Developer(s)

- Data Scientist(s) (Milan preferred)

- C++ Developer(s) (Milan preferred)

Apply at jobs@horus.tech

We recently got funded and we are growing the team and operations internationally. We are opening two new offices in EU and US to prepare for entering the market by the end of 2016. We can sponsor VISAs for the positions based in Italy.
